title: Vincent Martin (rugby union)
text: Vincent Martin (born 4 September 1992) is a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for <a href="Montpellier%20H%C3%A9rault%20Rugby">Montpellier HR</a> in the <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a>. His position is <a href="centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a>, although he can also play as a <a href="wing%20%28rugby%20union%29">wing</a>. In November 2012, he was named in the <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">France</a> 30-man squad for the <a href="2012%20end-of-year%20rugby%20union%20tests">2012 autumn internationals</a> by coach <a href="Philippe%20Saint-Andr%C3%A9">Philippe Saint-André</a>.
